FILE_STORAGE.description: if you don't have access to a cloud storage service you can change the value to "web" and ignore all other variables (that means you can only use urls to refer to images and files but you won't be able to upload anything or change css and script cards)

PROVIDER.description: choose the fog gem for your cloud provider (eg. fog/aws, fog/rackspace, or fog/google)

DIRECTORY.description: the cloud directory also known as bucket

SUBDIRECTORY.description: directory in your bucket used to store file uploads (defaults to "files")

CREDENTIALS_PROVIDER.description: name of your cloud provider (eg. "AWS", "Rackspace", or "Google")

CREDENTIALS_GOOGLE_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: required if you use Google Cloud

CREDENTIALS_GOOGLE_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: required if you use Google Cloud

scripts.postdeploy: env DECKO_SEED_REPO_PATH='db/seed' bundle exec rake db:setup
